tasks.fedify-codegen: cat ../../vocab/vocab.ts > /dev/null || (deno run --allow-read --allow-write --check ../../codegen/main.ts ../../vocab/ ../runtime/ > ../../vocab/vocab.ts && deno fmt ../../vocab/vocab.ts && deno cache ../../vocab/vocab.ts && deno check ../../vocab/vocab.ts)
tasks.codegen: deno task fedify-codegen && deno task generate-import-map
tasks.check: deno task codegen && deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check **/*.ts && deno check **/*.tsx
tasks.cli: deno task codegen && echo "import '\$fresh/src/dev/cli.ts'" | deno run --unstable -A -
tasks.manifest: deno task codegen && deno task cli manifest $(pwd)
tasks.start: deno task codegen && deno run -A --watch=static/,routes/ --unstable-kv dev.ts
tasks.build: deno task codegen && deno run -A dev.ts build
tasks.preview: deno task codegen && deno run -A main.ts
